Basic Abilities.Name: Basic Attack (P) / Basic Attack (M)
Basic Abilities.Effect: A basic attack. The user may choose either BATK (P) or BATK (M). Add the corresponding stat depending on their choice (BATK (P) = Physical Attack. BATK (M) = Magical Attack).This attack can be used even when sealed and its use cannot be prevented by any means, outside of Stun.

Basic Abilities.Name: Dash
Basic Abilities.Effect: The user may move up to 1.5x their MP (rounded down) instead of 1x. (Dash is a Full Action, which takes up both the movement and standard actions.)

Basic Abilities.Name: Backstep
Basic Abilities.Effect: The user moves one tile in a cardinal direction without triggering Attack of Opportunity.  This can only be used when adjacent to a foe.

Basic Abilities.Name: Attack of Opportunity
Basic Abilities.Effect: When a foe in the user's melee either leaves that melee with their movement action, or uses a ranged attack that doesn't target the user, the user may use this move to perform a Basic Attack on them.

Bard.Name: Rising Hope
Bard.Effect: The user and allies within their melee range have +1 ACC and +1 Crit Range. If the user has given a buff to or used Harmony on an ally within the last two rounds, this gives an additional +1 accuracy for one round. Rising Hope does not stack with more than one Bard.

Bard.Name: Harmony
Bard.Effect: For one round, the target cannot be affected by any status or debuff and has any such effect removed. If the target is affected by unremovable Poison, Burn or Bleed upon the usage or during the duration of this move, they gain +3 EVAs, +2 ACC, or +5 DMG respectively for the duration of the status. This move does not interact with self-inflicted statuses or debuffs in any way.

Bard.Name: Encore
Bard.Effect: The user rolls 1d20 and stores the result (this is NOT an accuracy roll). As a Reaction, the user may use, or give to an ally within Range 3, the number rolled as an accuracy check for their attack. This move cannot be used if the user already has a d20 stored.

Bard.Name: Primadonna
Bard.Effect: The targets gain +5 ATK/MAG; as long as those buffs are active, the targets also have -3 unremovable DR on Standard/Full attacks. Either player may choose to lose the buff after one round, on their turn as a Trigger action. This does not stack.

Bard.Name: Crescendo
Bard.Effect: As a Free action, the user and all allies in Star 5 gain +1 ACC and +2 Crit Range until the start of the user's next turn. As a Standard action, this move is instead Global and targets instead gain +10 DMG and +3 Crit Range for one round.

Cryokinetic.Name: Invoke: Ice
Cryokinetic.Effect:
When targeted with a non- Free, Swift, or Global attack from a foe, the user gains an Ice Stack (max three) after the move is resolved. Only two Ice Stacks may be gained per round.

If the accuracy roll of an attack targeting the user rolls X+, that attack loses one die, where X = 15 - # of Ice Stacks.

Cryokinetic.Name: Mist
Cryokinetic.Effect: For one round, all attacks made by enemies from inside the user's Burst 2 deal -5 damage. The user may spend up to two Ice Stacks to extend this effect's duration by one for each stack used, or spend three stacks for a duration of two rounds and a range of Burst 3. This move cannot be used again while its effect is active.

Cryokinetic.Name: Frost Barrier
Cryokinetic.Effect: The user gains a Shield/1 equal to 2d8+X, where X is thrice the amount of Ice Stacks the user chooses to spend, minimum one stack.

Cryokinetic.Name: Ice Wall
Cryokinetic.Effect: The user creates a 3-tile wall of Ice in a cardinal direction, or a diagonal one with halved length (rounded up). This Ice has 15 HP. Foes who end their turn with at least one of these Ice tiles in their melee take 10 damage. The user may spend Ice Stacks to increase the wall's base length by one for each stack spent. The wall expires after 3 rounds. The user may shatter the wall as a Trigger action after one turn, destroying it and inflicting 3 Bleed/2 on foes within melee of it. This move ignores Range Rule.

Cryokinetic.Name: Flash Freeze
Cryokinetic.Effect: This player may use this when targeted by an attack after damage has been rolled, and must spend one Ice Stack to do so. The interrupted attack loses all of its additive dice (excluding Critcal Hit). The user may spend an additional Ice Stack to also remove the attack's additive damage buffs, or two additional Ice Stacks to remove all positive damage factors.

Guardian.Name: Strike Guard
Guardian.Effect: If the opponent rolls 14+ on their accuracy on an attack that is targetting the user or an ally in their melee, the attack deals -5 damage.

Guardian.Name: Vanguard
Guardian.Effect: This move may be used when an ally in range is targeted by an attack, after damage is rolled. The user moves to a tile in the ally's melee, and the ally takes 5 less damage from the attack. If the user is also a target of the attack, both the user and the Ally take 10 less damage instead. This effect does not stack with multiple Guardians.

Guardian.Name: Fortify
Guardian.Effect: The target gains X Shield/1, where X is 35% of the amount of damage the user has taken directly from attacks since the beginning of their last turn (max 30 Shield).

Guardian.Name: Tenacity
Guardian.Effect: This may be used once per turn if the target has not been targeted with an attack for one round. The target heals 15% of their lost HP.

Guardian.Name: Radiance
Guardian.Effect: The user takes 80% damage from attacks for two rounds. Additionally, for one round, whenever an ally is targeted by an attack from within the user’s Burst 2, the user may use a Reaction to redirect 30% of the damage the ally would take to themselves. (Redirected damage cannot be reduced by any means, nor can it stack with multiple users.)

Pyrokinetic.Name: Invoke: Fire
Pyrokinetic.Effect:
When targetting a foe with a non- Free, Swift, or Global attack, the user gains a Fire Stack (max three) after the move is resolved. After gaining a Fire Stack, the user may not gain another one until the start of their next turn.

If the accuaracy roll of an attack by the user rolls X+, that attack gains one die, where X = 15 - # of Fire Stacks the user has.

Pyrokinetic.Name: Comet
Pyrokinetic.Effect: The user does the following things in any order: deals damage equal to the rolled amount to up to two foes in melee range, moves up to their full MP range. This move's damage is immune to outside factors. Do not add MAG.

Pyrokinetic.Name: Ignition
Pyrokinetic.Effect: The user spends 1 to 3 Fire Stacks to use this move. Their next attack gains 3X Burn/1, where X is the number of Stacks spent.

Pyrokinetic.Name: Afterburn
Pyrokinetic.Effect: The user may spend 1 or 2 Fire Stacks to gain +2 or +3 accuracy, respectively, for one turn. An additional Fire Stack may be spent for Invoke Fire to grant an extra dice this turn.

Pyrokinetic.Name: Kinetic Energy
Pyrokinetic.Effect: The user may spend two Fire Stacks to gain +10 damage on their next attack, or three Fire Stacks to gain +1 die and +15 damage to their next attack.

Rifter.Name: Time Matrix
Rifter.Effect: If the user rolls 14+ for their accuracy on an attack, the attack deals +5 damage.

Rifter.Name: Rewind
Rifter.Effect: This move can be used after the user rolls damage for an attack. The user may reroll up to 3 damage dice, but takes 3% of the attack's damage per die rerolled as recoil. Rerolled dice cannot trigger bombs or inverse bombs.

Rifter.Name: Vortex
Rifter.Effect: Add 20% of the highest damage of the user's last attack on any target to their next attack (this does not include multiplicative positive damage modifiers).

Rifter.Name: Paradox
Rifter.Effect: The user may use a Once/Twice/Thrice move without expending a use this turn, even if the move is out of uses. The user may not use Paradox in conjunction with Reaction or Trigger moves. The user takes 20% of the damage from the Paradox move as recoil.

Rifter.Name: Time Dilation
Rifter.Effect: This may be used when the player is targeted with an attack, after damage is rolled. The attacker takes one third of the damage dealt to the user after the user takes the damage.

Skirmisher.Name: Glide
Skirmisher.Effect: When dashing, the player may move up to 2x their MP instead of 1.5. If they do, the dash caps at 12 MP. Additionally, the player's dash ignores the effects of Slow.

Skirmisher.Name: Quick Thinking
Skirmisher.Effect: The user may use this move after their standard action to move up to half of their MP (rounded down). This movement is unaffected by movement AoO and Slow.

Skirmisher.Name: Stealth
Skirmisher.Effect: This turn, the user’s Backstep becomes a Free action. While under this effect, the user has -2 MP.

Skirmisher.Name: Outmaneuver
Skirmisher.Effect: The user may sacrifice up to 4 unused MP to gain +1 accuracy for every 2 MP sacrificed for one turn.

Skirmisher.Name: Tunneling
Skirmisher.Effect: This turn, the user may move through all tiles and Enemy Players/Monsters as if they were regular terrain, but they may not perform/end any action on tiles that they normally can't move through (Stop, Ice, Broken, or Bone).

Skirmisher.Name: Time's Edge
Skirmisher.Effect: The user's next Standard/Full action this turn adds 25% ATK/MAG. When the user's current turn would normally end, extend it with an additional Standard that does not add ATK/MAG and is immune to all outside damage factors. If the first Standard/Full dealt no damage, all modifiers instead apply to the extra standard (including 25% ATK/MAG and non-immunity to outside damage factors)
